#Text=Wikinews Shorts : February 20 , 2014
#Text=A compilation of brief news reports for
#Text=Thursday , February 20 , 2014
#Text=.
#Text=Contribute to Wikinews by expanding these briefs or add a new one .
#Text=Ukrainian truce established
#Text=Kiev 's Independence Square before violence erupted .
#Text=Image : Noobuster007 .
#Text=Ukraine
#Text=' s President Viktor Yanukovych declared a truce after a violent evening in Kiev ' s Independence Square .
#Text=There was brief peace just five days ago when protesters agreed to unblock downtown streets .
#Text=That was soon broken as violence occurred when interior ministry troops , special " Berkut " security forces , and police officers confronted protesters .
#Text=So far 26 people , including protesters and ten police officers , have been killed in Independence Square clashes .
#Text=This is the most violence the country has seen since it gained independence 20 years ago .
#Text=Sources
#Text=Nick Paton Walsh , Greg Botelho and Victoria Butenko .
#Text=" Truce declared in bloodied Ukraine , but will it last through talks ?

column1: #Text=Facebook plans to purchase messaging service for US$ 16 billion
#Text=WhatsApp logo Image : WhatsApp Inc. .
#Text=Facebook
#Text=yesterday announced a plan to purchase WhatsApp for US$ 16 billion .
#Text=Facebook 's plan says it will pay US$ 12 billion in stocks and US$ 4 billion in cash .
#Text=All parties are still waiting regulatory approval .
#Text=The deal could potentially be worth US$ 19 billion with US$ 3 billion more being offered to employees .
#Text=Employees who remained at Facebook for four years would be offered restricted stock .
#Text=WhatsApp is a messaging service where users can send text , picture , and video messages using their data plans , instead of their messaging plan .
#Text=The company has over 450 million world-wide active users , with about 70 percent of those users being active daily .
#Text=WhatsApp adds about one million new users per day .
#Text=Facebook founder Mark Zuckerberg said the app will not change for users .
#Text=Sources
#Text=Julianne Pepitone .
#Text=" Facebook to Buy WhatsApp for a Whopping $ 16 Billion " — NBC News , February 19 , 2014
#Text=Allstair Barr .
#Text=" Facebook agrees to buy WhatsApp for $ 16 billion " — USA Today , February 19 , 2014
#Text=Australia releases confidential information of thousands of refugees
#Text=The records of around 10,000 asylum-seekers in Australia were made available by the Australian government until The Guardian made authorities aware yesterday the data was freely accessible .
#Text=Confidential refugee files were accessed , featuring the names , nationalities , locations , and arrival information .
#Text=Paul Power , chief executive of the advocacy group Refugee Council of Australia , said the situation risked those in refugee centers in Australia , as well as their families .
#Text=In a speech delivered last November , Immigration Minister Scott Morrison said that the Australian government was responsible for protecting the identities of refugees .
#Text=Now the Department of Immigration and Border Protection is being called to account for its role under Australia 's privacy laws , including negligence .
#Text=Sources
#Text=" Australia mistakenly publishes asylum seekers ' names , other personal details " — Japan Today , February 19 , 2014
#Text=Oliver Laughland , Paul Farrell and Asher Wolf .
#Text=" Immigration Department data lapse reveals asylum seekers ' personal details " — The Guardian , February 18 , 2014
